alignat:
\begin{alignat}{2}
  s&\colon H\rtimes G\to G,&\quad& (h,g)\mapsto g,\\
  t&\colon H\rtimes G\to G,&\quad& (h,g)\mapsto t(h)g,\\
  \id&\colon G\to H\rtimes G,&\quad& g\mapsto (1,g),
\

\begin{alignat}{2}
  s^{(2)}&\colon H\rtimes G\to G,&\quad& (h,g)\mapsto g,\\
  t^{(2)}&\colon H\rtimes G\to G,&\quad& (h,g)\mapsto t(h)g,\\
  \id^{(2)}&\colon G\to H\rtimes G,&\quad& g\mapsto (1,g),
\

\begin{alignat}{2}
  \eta&\colon V\to G,&\quad& v\mapsto \eta_v,\\
  \eta&\colon E\to H\rtimes G,&\quad& e\mapsto 
    \eta_e\colon F_1e\cdot\eta_{t(e)}\Rightarrow \eta_{s(e)}\cdot\tilde F_1e,
\

\begin{alignat}{2}
  \eta_{g}         &\colon F_{g}\cdot\eta_y   
    &\Rightarrow& \eta_x\cdot\tilde F_{g},\\
  \eta_{g^\prime}  &\colon F_{g^\prime}\cdot\eta_y   
    &\Rightarrow& \eta_x\cdot\tilde F_{g^\prime},\\
  \theta_{g}       &\colon F_{g}\cdot\theta_y 
    &\Rightarrow& \theta_x\cdot\tilde F_{g},\\
  \theta_{g^\prime}&\colon F_{g^\prime}\cdot\theta_y 
    &\Rightarrow& \theta_x\cdot\tilde F_{g^\prime}.
\
